Text saved: Suzanne Collins loves old Greek stories. These stories gave her an idea for her book. Her book is called 'The Hunger Games'.

These young people went into a labyrinth. The Minotaur lived there. The Minotaur ate them. But one young man fought the Minotaur. His name was Theseus. He killed it.

Suzanne thinks Katniss Everdeen is like Theseus. Katniss lives in the future.
